SEARCH
Package com.dua3.meja.io

Interface WorkbookWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
CsvWorkbookWriter, HtmlWorkbookWriter, XlsWorkbookWriter, XlsxWorkbookWriter
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface WorkbookWriter
Abstract base class for writing workbook data.

  • Field Details

    • PROGRESS_INDETERMINATE

      static final double PROGRESS_INDETERMINATE
      This variable represents an indeterminate progress value.

      In certain situations, there may be a need to indicate progress where the exact value is unknown or cannot be determined. In such cases, the value of PROGRESS_INDETERMINATE can be used.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • setOptions

      default void setOptions(com.dua3.utility.options.Arguments options)
      Sets the options for the method. This method ignores the passed options; it is meant as a default implementation for Writer implementations that don't take options.
      Parameters:
      options - the arguments containing the options to be set

    • write

      default void write(Workbook workbook, URI uri) throws IOException
      Write workbook to file.
      Parameters:
      workbook - the workbook to write
      uri - the URI to write to
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs when writing out the workbook

    • write

      default void write(Workbook workbook, OutputStream out) throws IOException
      Write workbook to a stream.
      Parameters:
      workbook - the workbook to write
      out - the stream to write to
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs when writing out the workbook

    • write

      default void write(Workbook workbook, URI uri, DoubleConsumer updateProgress) throws IOException
      Write workbook to file.
      Parameters:
      workbook - the workbook to write
      uri - the URI to write to
      updateProgress - callback for progress updates
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs when writing out the workbook

    • write

      void write(Workbook workbook, OutputStream out, DoubleConsumer updateProgress) throws IOException
      Write workbook to a stream.
      Parameters:
      workbook - the workbook to write
      out - the stream to write to
      updateProgress - callback for progress updates
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs when writing out the workbook
